meanings.definition: Very small or tiny in size.
meanings.sent1: The weensy kitten could fit in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent2: I found a weensy bug crawling on the leaf.
meanings.sent3: The weensy toy car got lost in the pile of toys.
meanings.sent4: Her weensy voice was barely audible over the noise.
meanings.sent5: The weensy seed grew into a towering tree.

meanings.sent1: She only needed a weensy bit of sugar for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: I added a weensy of salt to enhance the flavor.
meanings.sent3: He put a weensy of effort into his school project.
meanings.sent4: The weensy of paint left was just enough to finish the job.
meanings.sent5: A weensy of kindness can go a long way.
